UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: A novel antimicrobial peptide from skin secretions of the tree frog Theloderma kwangsiensis.
Literature.Author: Yan H, Liu Y, Tang J, Mo G, Song Y, Yan X, Wei L, Lai R

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:2.5% Hemolysis=100 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:3.7% Hemolysis=200 µg/ml,Rabbit erythrocytes:3.2% Hemolysis=100 µg/ml,Rabbit erythrocytes:3.5% Hemolysis=200 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=100µg/ml),Shigella dysenteriae(MIC=50µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 2592(MIC=50µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(no activity data),Candida albicans ATCC 2002(MIC=10µg/ml),Candida albicans 08030401(MIC=50µg/ml),Candida albicans 08022821(MIC=25µg/ml),Candida albicans 08032815(MIC=200µg/ml),Candida albicans 08030102(MIC=100µg/ml),Candida albicans 08022710(no activity data)
